summary: This bill, H.R. 1673, proposes to rename the United States Postal Service facility located at 28 East Airy Street in Norristown, Pennsylvania, as the "Charles L. Blockson Post Office Building." The bill outlines the official designation and mandates that any existing references to the facility be updated to reflect the new name. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 27, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. It is sponsored by multiple representatives from Pennsylvania.
